articles.author: David Schechter, Haley Rush, Chance Horner
articles.title: Ancient methane escaping from melting glaciers could potentially warm the planet even more - CBS News
articles.description: Spiking temperatures in the Arctic are rapidly melting glaciers. Scientists are now worried about underground methane, a potent greenhouse gas, leaking up to the surface.
articles.content:
As mighty glaciers melt in the Arctic, new research finds million-year-old methane gas trapped beneath the ice is surfacing, with a potential to further warm the planet. 
"Glacial retreat is the big… [+5617 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp users on iOS can now send uncompressed media as a file - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new feature on iOS that allows users to share photos and videos as a document to preserve their original quality. A similar feature is being tested for Android.
